scripts.sema: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns run android
scripts.dema: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns debug android
scripts.semi: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns run ios
scripts.demi: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns debug ios
scripts.sema-bluetooth: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.semi-bluetooth: npm i && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.clean: rm -rf hooks node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.eval.mobile: cd apps/eval-mobile && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.shared: npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.js && npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.map && npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.d.ts && npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.ngfactory.ts && npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.ngsummary.json && npx rimraf -- libs/**/*.metadata.json && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.js && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.map && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.d.ts && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.ngfactory.ts && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.ngsummary.json && npx rimraf -- xplat/**/*.metadata.json
scripts.nuke: npm run clean && npm run clean.eval.mobile && npm run clean.shared
scripts.ns-setup: npm uninstall -g nativescript && npm install -g nativescript
scripts.ios-release: npm run nuki && cd apps/eval-mobile && tns build ios --release
scripts.profile-android-layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartevaluation > layout-profile.txt
scripts.android-framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartevaluation framestats > framestats.txt
